00035 #include <thrust/detail/type_traits.h>
00036 #include <thrust/iterator/detail/permutation_iterator_base.h>
00037 #include <thrust/iterator/iterator_traits.h>
00038 #include <thrust/detail/backend/dereference.h>

00040 namespace thrust

00043 namespace detail

00046 // XXX remove when we no longer need backend::dereference
00047 struct permutation_iterator_friend;
00048

00051 
00126 template <typename ElementIterator,
00127           typename IndexIterator>
00128   class permutation_iterator
00129     : public thrust::detail::permutation_iterator_base<
00130         ElementIterator,
00131         IndexIterator
00132       >::type
00133 {
00136   private:
00137     typedef typename detail::permutation_iterator_base<ElementIterator,IndexIterator>::type super_t;
00138 
00139     friend class experimental::iterator_core_access;
00143   public:
00147     __host__ __device__
00148     permutation_iterator()
00149       : m_element_iterator() {}
00150 
00158     __host__ __device__
00159     explicit permutation_iterator(ElementIterator x, IndexIterator y)
00160       : super_t(y), m_element_iterator(x) {}
00161 
00165     template<typename OtherElementIterator, typename OtherIndexIterator>
00166     __host__ __device__
00167     permutation_iterator(permutation_iterator<OtherElementIterator,OtherIndexIterator> const &r
00168     // XXX remove these guards when we have static_assert
00169     , typename detail::enable_if_convertible<OtherElementIterator, ElementIterator>::type* = 0
00170     , typename detail::enable_if_convertible<OtherIndexIterator, IndexIterator>::type* = 0
00171     )
00172       : super_t(r.base()), m_element_iterator(r.m_element_iterator)
00173     {}
00174 
00177   private:
00178     typename super_t::reference dereference() const
00179     {
00180       return *(m_element_iterator + *this->base());
00181     }
00182 
00183     // make friends for the copy constructor
00184     template<typename,typename> friend class permutation_iterator;
00185 
00186     // XXX WAR this problem with the omp compile
00187     //     remove this when we no longer need backend::dereference
00188     friend struct detail::permutation_iterator_friend;
00189 
00190     ElementIterator m_element_iterator;
00193 }; // end permutation_iterator
00194 
00195 
00206 template<typename ElementIterator, typename IndexIterator>
00207 __host__ __device__
00208 permutation_iterator<ElementIterator,IndexIterator> make_permutation_iterator(ElementIterator e, IndexIterator i)
00209 {
00210   return permutation_iterator<ElementIterator,IndexIterator>(e,i);
00211 }

00219 } // end thrust
